00011 // Inherit from this to get threading.  The usage is:
00012 //     threaded.start()
00013 //     threaded.join()
00014 // Implement the run() function as the thread.
00015 class Threaded {
00016     public:
00017         Threaded();
00018         ~Threaded();
00019         virtual void start();
00020         virtual void stop();
00021         void join();
00022         virtual void run() = 0;
00023         bool running();
00024     protected:
00025         volatile bool stopRequested;
00026     private:
00027         void startRun();
00028         volatile bool _running;
00029         boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread> runThread; 
00030         boost::mutex startup_mutex;
00031         boost::condition startup_condition;
00032 };

00059     void block_until_done();

00064     boost::condition cond;
00065     Fl_Window *win;

00070 class FLTKThread : public Threaded{
00071     private:
00072     bool window_requested;
00073     boost::mutex vector_lock;
00074     std::vector<fltknotify*> to_notify;
00075     boost::mutex window_lock;
00076     std::vector<ImageWindow*> windows;
00077     std::vector<gui_call*> gui_calls;
00078     std::vector<gui_call*> gui_calls_next;
00079 
00080     public:
00081     FLTKThread();
00082     virtual void run();
00083     void queue_gui_call(gui_call* gc);
00084     void queue_window(ImageWindow* win);
00085 
00086     friend class FLTKManager;
00087 };
